Text.Page:
The Wayfarer Camp has asked for assistance. I cannot release any of my soldiers to their aid, but you're not on my roster, are you?

Get over there and help them out. Take the field!

This wretched place will be the death of me yet.

By the Core, I miss the hot sands of home. It's dangerous to let thoughts turn away from the dangers we face.

I asked for help to make things a bit safer. Speak to Kaheure. She has orders for you.

Lucael's cold and grumpy, but this place isn't that bad! We're serving the federation and making the world a better place.

Of course, it'd be better if we weren't fighting to survive, but into every day some rain must fall. Or snow. Lots and lots of snow.
